Vps_DctrlEnumNode Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Display Controller API

Structure containing the properties of a the processing node. Node represents a VPS module which controls how and which display goes to perticulcar VENC. This structure is for enumerating this processing modules one by one and get the properties of it. More...

#include <vps_displayCtrlDataTypes.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 nodeId
 
UInt32 nodeType

UInt32 numOutputs
 

Detailed Description

Structure containing the properties of a the processing node. Node represents a VPS module which controls how and which display goes to perticulcar VENC. This structure is for enumerating this processing modules one by one and get the properties of it.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_DctrlEnumNode::nodeId

ID of the node. This ID should be used when enabling input of this node

UInt32 Vps_DctrlEnumNode::nodeIdx

Index of the node. Node Index starting from 0 to maximum number of nodes. Used at the time of enumerating nodes. After max number of nodes, this function returns error.

Char Vps_DctrlEnumNode::nodeName[VPS_DCTRL_MAX_NODE_NAME]

Name of the processing node

UInt32 Vps_DctrlEnumNode::nodeType

Type of the node, This type indicates whether this node can accept multiple input or output or not For valid values see Vps_DctrlNodeType

UInt32 Vps_DctrlEnumNode::numInputs

Number of all possible inputs for this node

UInt32 Vps_DctrlEnumNode::numOutputs

Number of all possible outputs for this node
